kv15.1:1.3: Nanu vīmaṃsā hetu, so ca adhipatīti?
kv15.1:1.5: Hañci vīmaṃsā hetu, so ca adhipati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:2.3: Hañci chandādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:3.3: Hañci vīriyādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:4.1: ☑ Nanu vīriyādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca indriyanti?
kv15.1:4.3: Hañci vīriyādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca indriyaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:5.1: ☑ Nanu vīriyādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca maggaṅganti?
kv15.1:5.3: Hañci vīriyādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca maggaṅgaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:6.3: Hañci cittādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:7.1: ☑ Nanu cittādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, so ca āhāroti?
kv15.1:7.3: Hañci cittādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, so ca āhāro, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:8.1: ☑ Nanu cittādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca indriyanti?
kv15.1:8.3: Hañci cittādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca indriyaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:9.3: Hañci vīmaṃsādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:10.1: ☑ Nanu vīmaṃsādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca indriyanti?
kv15.1:10.3: Hañci vīmaṃsādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca indriyaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:11.1: ☑ Nanu vīmaṃsādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca maggaṅganti?
kv15.1:11.3: Hañci vīmaṃsādhipati sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipati, tañca maggaṅgaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:12.1: ☑ Nanu ariyaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā uppajjati paccavekkhaṇā, tañcārammaṇanti?
kv15.1:12.3: Hañci ariyaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā uppajjati paccavekkhaṇā, tañcārammaṇaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:13.1: ☑ Nanu purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo, sā ca āsevanāti?
kv15.1:13.3: Hañci purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo, sā ca āsevanā, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:14.1: ☑ Nanu purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo, sā ca āsevanāti?
kv15.1:14.3: Hañci purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo, sā ca āsevanā, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:15.1: ☑ Nanu purimā purimā kiriyābyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo, sā ca āsevanāti?
kv15.1:15.3: Hañci purimā purimā kiriyābyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo, sā ca āsevanā, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv15.1:16.4: Hetupaccayena paccayo hoti, ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti, anantarapaccayena paccayo hoti, samanantarapaccayena paccayo hotīti?
